# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will provide substantial value to you. I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $18000, aiming to ensure you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the return on my investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
